vsParam:
Oh, you guys look dispirited,
what's going on?

Ah, Mimi! Here's the thing, we haven't found the material
we need for our next assignment, we are worried...

I see. I think I've seen this thing
somewhere when I went on adventure.

No hurry... How do I put it. For us adventurers,
information is a bargaining chip with value...
If you really want to know, it's harmless to tell you...

Gee... Don't keep us guessing when we are very worried,
you are petty, Mimi!

What... I, I am petty!?
What did I do? Tell me!
Mimi is not petty at all!

Hmmm. You apologized to me without hesitation,
but I bet you still think I am petty, right?

You can't take back what you said so easily!
I just said it's harmless to tell you!

Yeah! I am petty, and I am not going
to tell you that for nothing!

[px], make this. I'll only tell useful information
to a useful alchemist!

And you are only good at alchemy.
Make it as quickly as you can!

"Only good at alchemy"...
[px], don't take it to the heart...

In this case, let's make it of the best quality
and show Mimi! Okay?

Mimi,
we've finished that thing you asked!

Uh, this is pretty good.
Here, this is the remuneration.

Huh? Remuneration?
S, since when did this become a commission?
Cut the crap and take it!

Isn't this the material we are looking for?
Are you really giving it to us?

I, I just happened to see it.
It's appropriate to use it as a remuneration.

This thing is valuable,
you guys must be careful and don't break it!

You could have just told us the location...
Mimi, thank you!

You guys... Why would people who completed the
commission say thank you?

... Uh, I was mean,
so, consider it an apology.

... I am so sorry, I shouldn't have said that you are only good
at alchemy.

Y, you've gotten the material you want!
Leave now!

Stop wasting time here, I won't help you if you
miss the submission time of the assignment!
